backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder for backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a header title change to the App.tsx file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated auto-generated summaries of various frontend files for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme tokens and light/dark CSS variables defining the app’s color system and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry shell loading main.tsx and setting app metadata, manifest, and favicon.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, and standalone display properties.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router layout with header showing ZenBreathe title and footer tabs hidden on certain routes.
frontend/src/components/BreathCyclesDura: Dialog for selecting breathing cycles with increment/decrement controls and duration calculation.
Animated breathing circle that changes color and animation phase based on breathing state.
frontend/src/components/charts/BreathHol: Draws a simple SVG line chart visualizing breath-hold durations over time.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyMin: Renders a bar chart showing minutes spent per day relative to the week's maximum.
frontend/src/components/CustomPatternFor: Form for editing custom breathing pattern timings with numeric inputs.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseTileCard: Interactive exercise card with icon, description, and an info button.
frontend/src/components/HomeExerciseCard: Displays an interactive exercise card with icon, description, duration controls, and optional info and breathing pattern dialog.
frontend/src/components/SegmentedCircumf: Renders a segmented circular progress indicator based on elapsed time and segment duration.
frontend/src/components/SessionList.tsx: Shows a table of past sessions with formatted dates and durations, or an empty state message.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeCo: Provides a vertical slider UI for adjusting volume with optional icon display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingEngine.ts: Manages breathing cycle state, timing, voice prompts, and haptics for guided breathing patterns.
frontend/src/hooks/useHaptics.ts: Provides a simple vibrate helper using the browser's vibration API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and helpers for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerExerciseDuratio: Manages per-exercise durations with localStorage persistence and defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Requests and releases a screen wake lock based on active state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, CSS variables for themes and breathing phases, and keyframe animations for breathing effects.
frontend/src/lib/ambientAudio.ts: Controls looping rain and waves audio with exclusive playback and adjustable volume.
frontend/src/lib/breathingPatterns.ts: Exports preset breathing patterns and a utility to compute safe cycle durations.
frontend/src/lib/exerciseInfoContent.ts: Provides structured informational text for different breathing exercises.
frontend/src/lib/localStorageStore.ts: Wraps localStorage access for session data, breath-hold records, and per-exercise durations with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/playerDurationGuards.ts: Validates session durations and prevents premature auto-stop through safety checks.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for breath-hold records and breathing sessions.
frontend/src/lib/settingsStore.ts: Manages persisted user settings like ambient mode, volume, and guided meditation state.
frontend/src/lib/statsDerivations.ts: Computes derived stats such as last‑7‑days minutes, breath‑hold chart data, and recent sessions.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Centralizes string keys used for all localStorage entries.
frontend/src/lib/voiceGuidance.ts: Provides speech synthesis helpers for voice guidance, including queued and async speaking.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders an About page with app description, premium upgrade info, and quick settings, including navigation back home.
frontend/src/pages/Custom.tsx: Allows users to create a custom breathing pattern, adjust cycle count, and start a session using the configured settings.
frontend/src/pages/ExerciseInfo.tsx: Displays detailed info for a selected exercise and lets users start the associated breathing session if supported.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Shows preset breathing exercises with adjustable durations and links to start, view info, or access a breath-holding test.
frontend/src/pages/Player.tsx: Runs the breathing session with pattern loading, timing, audio, guidance, wake lock, and session logging logic.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Provides UI to configure voice guidance, ambient sounds, and other app preferences with persistence.
frontend/src/pages/Stats.tsx: Displays weekly breathing minutes, breath-hold trend charts, and a table of the last 10 sessions using data from localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/Test.tsx: Implements a breath-hold timer with start/stop controls, tracking elapsed time and updating all‑time records in localStorage.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker on page load to enable basic PWA support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme fonts, colors, screens, and borderRadius with custom CSS variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project features, current state, and implemented functionality for the ZenBreathe app.
